steps.title: Withdrawal Survey
steps.text: Please help us make our study better by explaining the reasons for your withdrawal.
items: This study was taking up too much of my time.
There was not enough benefit for me to want to continue.
Parts of this study were too difficult for me to complete.
I am withdrawing for personal reasons that do not involve this study.

items.prompt: Describe why you are withdrawing in your own words.

steps.title: Withdraw From Study
steps.text: Describe why you are withdrawing in your own words.
